meanings.definition: A person who raises silkworms for the production of silk.
meanings.sent1: The sericulturists carefully tended to the silkworms to ensure a good silk yield.
meanings.sent2: Many sericulturists in the village work hard to produce high-quality silk.
meanings.sent3: The sericulturists organized a silkworm beauty pageant for fun.
meanings.sent4: The sericulturists were like artists, weaving threads of silk into delicate masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: Under the moonlight, the sericulturists' dedication to their silkworms shone brightly.

meanings.definition: Those involved in the cultivation of mulberry trees for silk production.
meanings.sent1: The sericulturists planted rows of mulberry trees to feed the silkworms.
meanings.sent2: In the silk industry, sericulturists play a crucial role in mulberry tree cultivation.
meanings.sent3: The sericulturists had a mulberry tree planting competition for a laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sericulturists' dedication to mulberry trees was as strong as the roots themselves.
meanings.sent5: The sericulturists' hands were stained green from tending to the mulberry trees all day.
